title: Undraft the bylaws: CoC [due June 28]
author: ebullient
content:
[![🗳️ Vote progress](https://www.commonhaus.org/votes/commonhaus/foundation/172.svg)](https://github.com/commonhaus/foundation/pull/172#issuecomment-2183161249 "IC_kwDOKRPTI86CIGWh")

Continuing with our reviews, taking a detour into the Code of Conduct policy.

This PR includes undrafting a template you can use _if_ your project doesn't already have a Code of Conduct established.

voting group: @commonhaus/cf-egc 

Do one of the following:

- Approve the PR or react with 👍 (:+1:) if it looks good to you
- Review with Comments or react with 👀 (:eyes:) if you're "ok" with it (it may not be your favorite)
- If you think it needs discussion or revision
    - Create a review, add your comments and require changes
    - Use the +- button to make a suggestion (instead of just adding a comment).
